synopsis.text:
Now here to stay and no school to attend, the mischievous Banji Suke finds himself constantly on the move with his family due to their troublemaking antics. After causing chaos in their latest town and damaging the school, they're left with only one option: enroll Banji in an all-girls academy. To avoid humiliation and fit in, Banji must disguise himself as a girl, a task that comes with its own challenges, such as mastering the art of makeup and wearing a bra.

As Banji navigates the complexities of his new life, he finds himself at the bottom of the social ladder. To make matters worse, he must hide his true identity from the girl who has captured his heart while evading the female bullies who are eager to expose his secret. Little does Banji know, danger lurks in the shadows as assassins are hot on his trail, waiting for the perfect moment to strike. Can Banji maintain his disguise, survive the social pressures of school, and keep his pursuers at bay? Only time will tell in this thrilling and comedic tale of deception and self-discovery.
